name: Telangana Caste Certificate
description: Application form for obtaining a caste certificate in Telangana. Required for reservation benefits in education and employment.

name: Birth Certificate Application
description: Application form for birth registration and certificate. Required for school admission, passport, and various government services.

name: Death Certificate Application
description: Application form for death registration and certificate. Required for insurance claims, property transfer, and legal proceedings.

name: Birth/Death Certificate Corrections
description: Application for corrections in birth or death certificates. Used when there are errors in the original certificate.

name: Income Declaration Form (ePass)
description: Self-declaration of family income for ePASS scholarship applications. Required for educational benefits and subsidies.

name: Old Age Pension Application
description: Application for old age pension scheme. For senior citizens to receive monthly pension benefits.

name: Vehicle Sale Affidavit (RTA)
description: Affidavit for vehicle sale/transfer. Required when selling or transferring vehicle ownership.

name: Vehicle Late Registration Affidavit
description: Affidavit for late vehicle registration. Required when registering a vehicle after the stipulated period.

name: Multiple Vehicle Affidavit (RTA)
description: Affidavit for owning multiple vehicles. Required for declaration when owning more than one vehicle.

name: Electricity Name Change Bond (TSSPDCL)
description: Indemnity bond for name change in electricity connection. Required when transferring electricity connection to a new name.

name: New Meter Indemnity Bond (TSSPDCL)
description: Indemnity bond for new electricity meter installation. Required when applying for a new electricity connection.
